Summary: Bright red lights above Pikes Peak
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was new years and i went outside to look at some fireworks i had been hearing and I saw what first looked like a bright red firework, but it never blew up. then i noticed two other red balls of light. they seemed to move across the sky in a starit line and maintained a constant pace, and gaining alititude untill they were to high up to see. Happy New Years!
